Constructor Detail

Product

public Product(int productID,
               int price,
               int cost,
               java.lang.String productName,
               int categoryID,
               java.lang.String categoryName)
Class constructor.

Parameters:
productID - the productID of the product to be created
price - the retail price of the product in cents
cost - the cost to seller of the product in cents
productName - the name of the product
categoryID - the categoryID of the product to be created
categoryName - the name of the category to which the product belongs
